text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/validation
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    fatalFatalA failure that is likely relevant to local workflow environments, considered sufficient to suspend the resource/element and one or more action has been taken.
    warningWarningA failure that may be relevant to some local workflow environments, but in and of itself is not consider sufficient to suspend the resource/element. E.g. validating membership in an organization.
    recordonlyRecord onlyA failure that may be relevant to some local workflow environments and will be documented but not result in notification or publication of the error.

name: VhDirFailureAction
title: VhDir Failure Action
publisher: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the disposition of a primary source validation process that has failed.
